description:
## Objective
The objective is to add description, author, repository, homepage, to the package.json of the Mifos Community App.

### Description
1. Add description, author, repository, homepage etc, to the package.json of the Mifos Community App .

#### References
You may have a look at package.json files of other MIfos projects and check out [npm-package.json](https://docs.npmjs.com/files/package.json).

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/community-app).
name: Mifos- Add Description, Author, Repository and Homepage information to  package.json
